If I could I’ve give this zero stars. I’m very disappointed. I ordered this for my son for a photo shoot as we’re all are wearing blue overalls for this  shoot and was very disappointed when I saw it. It doesn’t even look like the picture shown here at all. I don’t even have enough time to get another one. It’s looks more like sky blue than regular blue jean overalls. The clips aren’t even attached to the strap. As I side I’m VERY DISAPPOINTED.

The material is great and soft but size up, my husband said his goods were a bit squished at times. We used it for a costume so it served its purpose.

评论概述: Comfortable but terrible hardware and unwearable after 2 minutes
评论详情: Are they cheap? Yes Do they fit? Yes That’s the extent of the positives. The front flap comes up very low. Definitely lower than shown on the model. The hardware is horrendous. The clasps on the overall straps aren’t even one piece. To secure themselves on the button it uses a tiny small piece of metal, which, when given any resistance, pops off. Leaving you strapless and hunting for the now missing tab somewhere on the ground. This happened while only fitting them on after removing them from the packaging. After figuring a way to permanently attach the straps (with zip ties) I had one of the buttons snap off and break in half after 2 minutes of usage. I attached the straps via safety pins to get me home, if not I’d have to hold my pans up all night. If you fall in love with them, plan on spending some money on getting better hardware that won’t break. Which after time and money, you just might be better off buying a higher quality pair in the first place.  I’ll be returning mine.
Got it timely and it fits! Just need to attach the strap gear so I can button them. Comes with gear but no instructions - all good, I can refer to another pair of bibs.
These are terrible and a waste of money. They had no buckles and sizing is way off. Don't buy

评论概述: They tried but buttons are necessary on overalls too
评论详情: The material is nice, seems sturdy.  The only problem was they weren’t finished…the buttons were missing and the hooks were in a separate bag.  I could figure out how to put on the hooks if the buttons for overalls were just sewn on, they are heavy duty and these were completely missing.  My son decided he’d figure out how to use them, and at the price we decided to keep.
They are not exact sizes, the quality and designs are very bad

In real clothes, I wear 32"-33" waist pants. I'm skinny. I can't say how it fit around my waist because I couldn't get it over my thighs. Also, even though I couldn't pull these up to my waist, the leg length was already too short. They're obviously made for 8 year old boys, not adults.  Also, not accustomed to having to assemble my clothes.
